alert.note: Alert for Carroll; Chariton; Daviess; Grundy; Linn; Livingston (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 23 at 4:39PM CDT until September 23 at 5:15PM CDT by NWS Kansas City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Pleasant Hill has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Chariton County in north central Missouri... Southwestern Linn County in north central Missouri... Eastern Daviess County in north central Missouri... Southern Grundy County in north central Missouri... Northeastern Carroll County in north central Missouri... Livingston County in north central Missouri... * Until 515 PM CDT. * At 439 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Gallatin to near Bosworth, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Chillicothe, Trenton, Gallatin, Jamesport, Meadville, Hale, Laclede, Bosworth, Wheeling, Utica, Chula, Laredo, Mendon, Tina, Jameson, Sumner, Rothville, Mooresville, Tindall and Lock Springs. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: Carroll; Chariton; Daviess; Grundy; Linn; Livingston
